text: Edward Richard Schreyer (born December 21, 1935) is a Canadian politician. He was the Governor General of Canada, the 22nd, from 1979 to 1984. He was also the 16th Premier of Manitoba from 1969 to 1977. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Governors-general of Canada Category:Premiers of Manitoba Category:Privy Councillors (Canada)
title: Edward Schreyer
